SELECT c.cart_id AS cartId, c.user_id AS userId, c.product_id AS productId, c.product_count AS productCount, c.selected_option AS selectedOption,
p.product_name AS productName, p.sale_price AS price,
-- ⭐ uploads/ 형태로 반환 CONCAT( '/uploads/', REPLACE(f.save_dir, 'uploads/', ''), -- uploads/ 중복 제거 '/', f.file_name ) AS imageUrl
FROM Cart c JOIN Product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN File f ON p.product_id = f.product_id AND f.file_type = 0
WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.cart_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Cart (user_id, product_id, product_count, selected_option) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{productCount}, #{selectedOption})
